afternoon.description: Visit the Louvre Museum, focusing on key works like the Mona Lisa and Venus de Milo to avoid museum fatigue.

evening.description: Enjoy a picnic dinner along the Seine River, taking in the beautiful city views.

morning.description: Start your day with a visit to the Eiffel Tower. Pre-book your tickets to skip the long queues.

night.description: Experience a traditional French dinner at a local bistro in the Latin Quarter.

afternoon.description: Explore the charming streets of Montmartre, visiting the Sacré-Cœur Basilica and Place du Tertre.

evening.description: Enjoy a delicious and affordable crepe from a street vendor.

morning.description: Visit the Musée d'Orsay, known for its Impressionist and Post-Impressionist masterpieces.

night.description: Return to the hotel and relax.

afternoon.description: Take a leisurely walk along the Seine River, admiring the bridges and architecture.

evening.description: Indulge in a final French dinner, trying a traditional dish like Boeuf Bourguignon.

morning.description: Visit the Palace of Versailles, exploring the palace and gardens.

night.description: Relax at the hotel, preparing for departure.

morning.description: Visit a local market and enjoy some final Parisian pastries.
